title: Points For Answering/Posting On Boards (RP redeem for points)
body: Rito should make a system where you get a point for every upvote you get on a board post or an answer and basically you are able to redeem the points for rp.But obviosuly there is a limit for upvotes maybe like 15 upvotes per day is the limit (you can still post on the board and answer question but you no longer can get any upvotes just to prevent spamming) So for example you have 300 upvotes points collected you can redeem that for a $10 code (1100 rp).I got this idea since most of us have other priorities to spend money on and don't want to spend too much money on just a game.Besides I feel like rito needs to be more rewarding to the players who actually spend time on the boards helping out and giving ideas.

replies.body: This would be a system that would be prone to abuse, I think. At most, I think you could only make it work with upvotes from Riot employees.
